SIMS Help

     

Glossary

Aspects

Aspect is the technical name of what we now refer to as a Column.

Assessment Period

The Assessment Period enables your school to track progress over time.

Formative

Formative assessment focuses on improving learning. Learn More

Strand

Define Strand

Subject

Define Subject

Summative

Summative assessment occurs at different intervals such as weekly, on completion of a topic of work, at the end of each term, or the end of the year. Learn More.

Define Topic

Class Log

The Class Log is an screen for teacher’s to use in the class room Learn More.

Find People

The main search in SIMS header Learn More.

Column Menu

Actions that can be performed on a column.

Menu Search

To quickly find the screen you need, you can type the name into the search. Learn More.

Menu

SIMS’s menu is the bright pink button in the top left corner of the screen Learn More.

Quick Links

Quick Links are shortcuts to regularly used screens. Learn More.
